short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a right-click menu option to screen links for redirects. Automatically flags Grabify links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds an option to the context (right-click) menu that allows you to see the redirects of any link. The results will show up in a new window, and will provide details on HTTP redirects, and also flag Grabify links.

My first Chrome extension. I thought maybe somebody could get some use out of it, so decided to share it.
